definition: living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic

sentences.english: The encoding rules are very flexible and support the representation of data graphs and polymorphism.
sentences.chinese: 編碼規則非常靈活並支持圖形數據和多態的表示。

sentences.english: Allthe rails width adjustment are quickly, easily accessible accessible acrossible across the entire width of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 在調幅範圍內，迅速靈活調整全機軌道寬窄。

sentences.english: If flexibility isn’t your strong suit, simply bend your knees to adjust.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的軀體不夠靈活，可以彎曲膝部來調整一下。

sentences.english: A soft felt hat with a wide flexible brim .
sentences.chinese: 有一個靈活的寬邊的軟氈帽。

sentences.english: From now on, we need to be more mobile and flexible, carefully choosing battle opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 今後，我們要更加機動靈活，精細地尋求。

sentences.english: The flexible dolly bar can effectively adjust the film space, and perform the accurate orientation.
sentences.chinese: 靈活的調節杆，能快速有效地調整膜距，正確定位。

sentences.english: The inscriptive writings are attaches after the certain carrier the short nimble miscellany prose.
sentences.chinese: “題跋”是附於一定載體之後的短小靈活的雜記散文。

sentences.english: This will improve your phrase-slinging ability.
sentences.chinese: 這可以幫助你提高靈活運用詞彙的能力。

sentences.english: Online education gives students enough flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 網上教育使學生們獲得了許多靈活性。
緊湊，靈活，高集成度的功率分佈。

sentences.english: Governance should not be a set of static processes without any flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 治理不應該是一組沒有任何靈活性的靜態過程。

sentences.english: Numerals are used in flexible and diversified ways in Chinese idioms.
sentences.chinese: 數詞在漢語成語中的使用是靈活多樣的。

sentences.english: A nursing bed which can disassemble and assemble flexibly and used for paralytic relates to a bed.
sentences.chinese: 可靈活拆裝的癱瘓病人護理牀，它涉及一種牀。

sentences.english: Pin connected main frame, short turning radius, flexible mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 鉸接式車架，轉彎半徑小，機動靈活。

sentences.english: Playing the cymbals can get fingers trained to work independently and build strength.
sentences.chinese: 敲打銅鈸可以訓練手指靈活性和力量。

sentences.english: This open architecture design provides extensive flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 這種開發式架構設計提供廣泛的靈活性。

definition: to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
